verses.verse: הַ֥לְלוּ <S%H1984><s%> Praise יָ֨הּ ׀ <S%H3050><s%> ye the LORD הַ֭לְלוּ <S%H1984><s%> Praise עַבְדֵ֣י <S%H5650><s%> O ye servants יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הַֽ֝לְלוּ <S%H1984><s%> praise אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> the name יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

יְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> become שֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> be the name יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD מְבֹרָ֑ךְ <S%H1288><s%> Blessed מֵֽ֝עַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> from this time forth וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> and for עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> evermore

מִמִּזְרַח־ <S%H4217><s%> From the rising שֶׁ֥מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> of the sun עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> to its מְבוֹא֑וֹ <S%H3996><s%> unto the going down מְ֝הֻלָּ֗ל <S%H1984><s%> [is] to be praised שֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> name יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the same the LORD'S

רָ֖ם <S%H7311><s%> [is] high עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> above כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all גּוֹיִ֥ם ׀ <S%H1471><s%> above all nations יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> is above הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> above the heavens כְּבוֹדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3519><s%> [and] his glory
מִ֭י <S%H4310><s%> Who כַּיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Who [is] like unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God הַֽמַּגְבִּיהִ֥י <S%H1361><s%> on high לָשָֽׁבֶת׃ <S%H3427><s%> who dwelleth
הַֽמַּשְׁפִּילִ֥י <S%H8213><s%> Who humbleth לִרְא֑וֹת <S%H7200><s%> [himself] to behold בַּשָּׁמַ֥יִם <S%H8064><s%> [the things that are] in heaven וּבָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> and in the earth

מְקִֽימִ֣י <S%H6965><s%> He raiseth up מֵעָפָ֣ר <S%H6083><s%> out of the dust דָּ֑ל <S%H1800><s%> the poor מֵֽ֝אַשְׁפֹּ֗ת <S%H830><s%> out of the dunghill יָרִ֥ים <S%H7311><s%> [and] lifteth אֶבְיֽוֹן׃ <S%H34><s%> the needy

לְהוֹשִׁיבִ֥י <S%H3427><s%> That he may set עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with נְדִיבִ֑ים <S%H5081><s%> [him] with princes עִ֝֗ם <S%H5973><s%> With נְדִיבֵ֥י <S%H5081><s%> [even] with the princes עַמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5971><s%> of his people

מֽוֹשִׁיבִ֨י ׀ <S%H3427><s%> to keep עֲקֶ֬רֶת <S%H6135><s%> He maketh the barren woman הַבַּ֗יִת <S%H1004><s%> house אֵֽם־ <S%H517><s%> mother הַבָּנִ֥ים <S%H1121><s%> of children שְׂמֵחָ֗ה <S%H8056><s%> [and to be] a joyful הַֽלְלוּ־ <S%H1984><s%> Praise יָֽהּ׃ <S%H3050><s%> ye the LORD
